plot: Documentary series on foreigners living in Galicia, in which they discuss how they live there and, as a game show, are submitted to tests to determine how integrated they are.
plot_en: Documentary series on foreigners living in Galicia, in which they discuss how they live there and, as a game show, are submitted to tests to determine how integrated they are.
plot_es: Documentary series on foreigners living in Galicia, in which they discuss how they live there and, as a game show, are submitted to tests to determine how integrated they are.
title: Como galegos!
